oracle_info.speaker: Carol Shillabeer
oracle_info.content: The practice in this area is guided by National Institute for Health and Care Excellence guidance, so it's pretty much guided.

oracle_info.speaker: Carol Shillabeer

oracle_info.speaker: Carol Shillabeer

oracle_info.speaker: Carol Shillabeer
